name: Italian Sausage and Pasta Soup
author: Yoly
summary: A pasta soup that is filling, quick, and easy to put together. Serve with a side salad and some crusty bread for a complete meal.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes with basil, garlic, and oregano
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
directions: Cook Italian sausage and onion in a skillet over medium-high heat until sausage is browned and crumbly and onion is soft and translucent, about 8 minutes
Mix in chicken broth, diced tomatoes, pasta, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper
Reduce heat and simmer until pasta is tender, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes
Add ricotta cheese and cook until ricotta is fully incorporated, 2 to 3 minutes more
Top each serving with 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese, 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, and 1/2 tablespoon fresh basil
